author: joey_02
content:
Probably very different for each client, but based off of this tweet I'm guessing around 21.6 gb a year? (130) / 6 years. Witness/cryptographic proofs probably blow this up, and network activity probably makes it super variable. Would be cool to see if there is any historical data or charts on this if anyone has it!

https://twitter.com/peter_szilagyi/status/1460533274393120772?s=20
